attributes.action: Allow all to have the option of triple science.
attributes.background: To let all students be able to do gcse triple science if they want so that if people only need a specific chemistry, physics or biology for a course they can get that done and not have to worry if they struggle with the other two subjects

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Government is responsible for the national curriculum, which requires all children to be taught science in Key Stage 4, but decisions about what GCSEs to offer are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
